metadata.Title: CVE-2017-5979 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description:
The prescan_entry function in fseeko.c in zziplib 0.13.62 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (NULL pointer dereference and crash) via a crafted ZIP file.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-5979` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libzzip-0-13 - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
zziplib-bin - 0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: zziplib package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.13.62-3ubuntu0.16.04.1').
